name: Paladin
description: Highest HP; heals 2 HP per turn; all healing effects are increased by 2

name: Sorcerer
description: Low HP; draws extra card; status effects last longer

name: Warlock
description: Medium HP; takes 2 damage per turn but gets +1 energy; attack cards deal +2 damage but cost +1 energy

name: Fighter
description: Medium HP; gets +1 energy per turn; attack cards deal +1 damage
